GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ASoC: mt6359: Fix refcount leak bug

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 1e7fe6906e9755d9e0242f9619c894ecd82fb9da, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 6835302853169441069e11bc4642300c22009c2e. For more details please see the references link.
